name: How much do you know about TOW Ross' Tan? | Quiz

questions.text: At Central Perk, who noticed Monica's tan?
questions.explanation:
Ross.

	Chandler: "Hey! Stop staring at my wife's legs! No no! Stop staring at your sister's legs!"

questions.text: How many steps are in Joey's routine when he's with a girl?
questions.explanation:
6.

	Joey: "I do six things! First, I look deep in her eyes. Then, I kiss her. Next I take my hand and I softly graze her thigh." (Chandler starts touching Joey's thigh incorrectly and Joey touches Chandler's thigh to show him how he does it.)

questions.text: Who did Amanda claim to sleep with?
questions.explanation:
Billy Joel.

	Phoebe (imitating Amanda): " 'Oh...I slept with Billy Joel'. All right, who hasn't?"

questions.text: How long was Ross supposed to wait in the booth before he turned to get his back sprayed?
Did Joey pay for the dinner he and Rachel had?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Joey (to Rachel): I thought you paid. Ha, guess we won't be going back there!"

questions.text: Which one of the guys admitted to Amanda that he had a pedicure?
questions.explanation:
Chandler.

	Ross: "Why, why do you---like with the-the toe separators?"

questions.text: What part of Rachel's clothing could Joey not get off?

questions.explanation:
False.

	Amanda had a fake British accent.

questions.text: Did Rachel and Joey decide to just be friends?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Joey: "Wow, I did not see this coming."

questions.text: Who lied to Ross about getting a tan?
questions.explanation:
Chandler.

	Ross: "Dude, you're not tanned."  Chandler: "No, I just had to get a picture of this."
